verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them that prophesy <S%H5030><s%> out of their own heart <S%H3820><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the foolish <S%H5036><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%>, that follow <S%H1980><s%> their own spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and have seen nothing <S%H7200><s%>!
O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> have been like foxes <S%H7776><s%> in the waste places <S%H2723><s%>.

Ye have not gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the gaps <S%H6556><s%>, neither built up <S%H1443><s%> the wall <S%H1447><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

They have seen <S%H2372><s%> falsehood <S%H7723><s%> and lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>, that say <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%>; but Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H3176><s%>: and they have made men to hope that the word <S%H1697><s%> would be confirmed <S%H6965><s%>.

Have ye not seen <S%H2372><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H4236><s%>, and have ye not spoken <S%H1696><s%> a lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%>, in that ye say <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%>; albeit I have not spoken <S%H559><s%>?

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H7723><s%>, and seen <S%H2372><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>, therefore <S%H5002><s%>, behold, I am against you, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be against the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that see <S%H2374><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions <S%H7080><s%>, and that divine lies <S%H3577><s%>: they shall not be in the council <S%H5475><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, neither shall they be written <S%H3789><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, neither shall they enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Because <S%H2937><s%>, even because they have seduced my people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Peace <S%H7965><s%>; and there is no peace <S%H7965><s%>; and when one buildeth up <S%H1129><s%> a wall <S%H2434><s%>, behold <S%H2009><s%>, they daub <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered mortar <S%H8602><s%>:

say <S%H559><s%> unto them that daub <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar <S%H5307><s%>, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%>; and ye <S%H859><s%>, O great hailstones <S%H417><s%>, shall fall <S%H5307><s%>; and a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall rend it <S%H1234><s%>.
Lo <S%H7023><s%>, when the wall is fallen <S%H5307><s%>, shall it not be said <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H2915><s%>, Where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it <S%H2902><s%>?

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: I will even rend <S%H1234><s%> it with a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> in my wrath <S%H2534><s%>; and there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and great hailstones <S%H417><s%> in wrath <S%H2534><s%> to consume it <S%H3617><s%>.

So will I break down <S%H2040><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> that ye have daubed <S%H2902><s%> with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar <S%H5060><s%>, and bring it down to the ground <S%H776><s%>, so that the foundation <S%H3247><s%> thereof shall be uncovered <S%H1540><s%>; and it shall fall <S%H5307><s%>, and ye shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof <S%H3045><s%>: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the wall <S%H7023><s%>, and upon them that have daubed <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar <S%H559><s%>; and I will say unto you <S%H7023><s%>, The wall is no more <S%H2902><s%>, neither they that daubed it;

to wit <S%H5030><s%>, the prophets of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and that see <S%H2374><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> for her <S%H7965><s%>, and there is no peace, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> out of their own heart <S%H3820><s%>; and prophesy thou against them <S%H5012><s%>,

and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the women that sew <S%H8609><s%> pillows <S%H3704><s%> upon all elbows <S%H679><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> for the head <S%H7218><s%> of persons of every stature <S%H6967><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>! Will ye hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and save <S%H2421><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> alive for yourselves <S%H2421><s%>?

And ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> me among my people <S%H5971><s%> for handfuls <S%H8168><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and for pieces <S%H6595><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, to slay <S%H4191><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that should not die <S%H4191><s%>, and to save <S%H2421><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> that should not live <S%H2421><s%>, by your lying <S%H3576><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> that hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto lies <S%H3577><s%>.

Wherefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H3704><s%>, I am against your pillows, wherewith ye <S%H859><s%> there hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> to make them fly <S%H6524><s%>, and I will tear <S%H7167><s%> them from your arms <S%H2220><s%>; and I will let the souls <S%H5315><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that ye hunt <S%H6679><s%> to make them fly <S%H6524><s%>.

Your kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> also will I tear <S%H7167><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall be no more in your hand <S%H3027><s%> to be hunted <S%H4686><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Because with lies <S%H8267><s%> ye have grieved <S%H3512><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, whom I have not made sad <S%H3512><s%>; and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>, that he should not return <S%H7725><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and be saved alive <S%H2421><s%>;

therefore ye shall no more see <S%H2372><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions <S%H7080><s%>, nor divine divinations <S%H7081><s%>: and I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
